doc.author: duanximeng
doc.description: 超出工单各环节时限情况统计表

sql.name: usd.Form_overtime
sql.item: select distinct comp.c700000003 as 流水号, comp.c801000003 as 业务类型 , comp.c801000006 as 受理号码, process.c700020011 as 节点类型, process.c700020005 as 处理员工, grou.c630000018 as 组名称, process.c700020017-process.c700020014 as 超时时间, comp.c700000010 as 工单单前状态, comp.c700000015 as 优先级 from t143 comp ,t84 process, t141 sysuser ,t132 sysuserandgroup,t131 grou where comp.c1=process.c700020001 and process.c700020017-process.c700020014>0 and process.c700020006=sysuser.c630000001 and sysuser.c630000015=grou.c1 ORDER BY comp.c700000003 asc
